item.description:
For this Meet-up we will return to the 2nd Story Theater in Warren, RI for a more adult oriented offering entitled "In the Next Room or The Vibrator Play." Here is the description of the play:

In the Next Room (or The Vibrator Play) is a play by Sarah Ruhl. It concerns the early history of the vibrator, when doctors used it as a clinical device to bring women to orgasm as treatment for "hysteria." Other themes include Victorian ignorance of female sexual desire, motherhood and breastfeeding, and jealousy. The play was nominated for three 2010 Tony Awards.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $27. Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please call the 2nd Story Theater at 401-247-4200.

Please Note that Friday nights at 2nd Story do sell out early. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Dinner Information

The Cafe is no longer open. I received an e-mail stating that they are permanently closed for dinner. We're going to try someplace new for dinner this time. Tyler Point Grille, was recommended and is fairly close to the theater. Here is their website:

http://www.tylerpointgrille.com/

For those that will be attending dinner, reservations will be made under "RI Theater Group" for 6:00 PM.

Cost of dinner will be handled as follows:

Drinks will be consigned to a separate check from the meal. Each person will add 30% to the price of their drink to cover the 8% RI Tax plus a 20% tip.

The meal will be on one check. A 20% tip will be added to the total and meal check will be divided evenly by the number of people attending the dinner.

I will send an e-mail including my cell phone number to all who RSVP "yes". If you will not make it to the restaurant by 6:00 PM please let me know.

Dinner is optional and is not included in the price of the ticket.

Meet-up Logistics

There is a fairly large parking lot located next to the theater between Market Street and Route 114 in Warren. A sign for Second Story Theater is on Route 114, although it's somewhat hidden.

I will be in the lobby at 7:30 and will be holding a small MEET-UP sign. Seating is first-come;first-served, so please be prompt so we can all sit together. When you RSVP, I will provide my cell phone number in case you're running late or get lost.
item.name: In the Next Room or The Vibrator Play
